Title: Silverlight Deep Linking
Description: This project will show you how to add Deep Linking to your Siverlight application in four simple steps.
HomeWiki:
This project will show you how to add Deep Linking to your Siverlight application in four simple steps.

In summary:

1. Add Frame control in MainPage.xaml
2. Add URI Routing using UriMapper
3. Add your pages to the application
4. Add navigation links to your MainPage.xaml

The step by step guide for this project can be found at http://www.silverlighttips.com/?tag=/deep+linking.

For more information or to learn about similar projects go to SilverlightTips.com.
